title: Evolver synthesizer logo
content:
Hi there,  
Any help with this, please? It's not pretty - but then Dave Smith, the designer, picked Novarese Stop for the logo of his earlier company, Sequential Circuits, and now uses Mistral for Dave Smith Instruments. Uurrghhh.  
This is from a photo of a Poly Evolver:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023929im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Poly%20Evolver%20Logo_3550.jpg)
  
And this is someone's copy:
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023929im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Logo%202_3876.png)

Thanks,  
George
author: George Horton

comments.content: Hahaha, Jinx, Akira. Although you caught Bauhaus, too. ;^D
